name: Endless Fire (Wallace Santos)
description:
BRIEF HISTORY:

Humanity is under intense threat from a system of planets 4 light years away. Insectoid-looking beings are sending parasites on asteroids to Earth to try to reproduce on our planet and exterminate the human race.

The humans then sent a probe-led combat mission where the probes must exterminate as many aliens as possible, and use their bodies as a basis for manufacturing a very resistant alloy that will be used in the construction of certain structures on the alien planet and then expand. the offensive in that territory.
